title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.
highlights: Run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, CodeLlama, Phi-2, Vicuna, etc. locally
macOS/Linux/Windows binaries, Docker images, REST & Go APIs

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate embeddings, pull/push models from PyPI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm.
highlights: Works in Node & browsers via fetch

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models (chat, embeddings, tool-calling).

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multimodal, RAG).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with async & streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI chat tool with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for QA & RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds on Linux/macOS.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama services in CI pipelines with GPU containers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete using Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with comptime JSON parsing.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP library wrapping Ollama for fault-tolerant GenServer chats.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Minimal Rust CLI for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into threads with slash commands.
